content: Patient is post‑operative, presenting with soreness and stiffness of the right upper extremity, moderate bruising and ecchymosis to the palm, and limited finger motion. The middle and ring fingers are held in a flexed position, limiting fist formation to about 4 centimeters from the palm, and she is unable to straighten these fingers. She reports that the symptoms are not too painful.
title: HPI Spencer

content: moderate ecchymosis to the palm consistent with postoperative state . There is uh the middle and ring fingers are hold in a flex position , limited fist about 4 centimeters from palm with composite selection , uh , unable to straighten fingers on the way .
title: Musculoskeletal

title: Assessment
